headline: A Look At Boston Scientific (BSX) Valuation As Analyst Optimism And Earnings Anticipation Build
summary: Boston Scientific (BSX) is drawing fresh attention as investors weigh upbeat analyst commentary, steady demand across key device franchises, and expectations ahead of its February 4 earnings release and projected profit of US$0.78 per share. See our latest analysis for Boston Scientific. At a share price of US$97.64, Boston Scientific has seen a 5.33% 30 day share price return and a 2.91% 1 year total shareholder return, with momentum recently supported by upbeat analyst commentary, product...
